item.title: Technical Indicator
item.author: Author
item.description: Accumulation/Distribution Line (ADL) The accumulation/distribution line gauges supply and demand by looking at where the price closed within the period’s range, and then multiplying that by volume. The A/D indicator is cumulative, meaning one period’s value is added or subtracted from the last. A rising A/D line helps confirm a rising price trend. A falling A/D line helps confirm a price downtrend. If the price is rising but A/D is falling, it signals underlying weakness and a potential decline in price.
